welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hardeeville, the charming city known for its friendly community and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Savannah/Hilton Head Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Savannah/Hilton Head Airport serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Savannah/Hilton Head Airport serves domestic flights operated by Allegiant Air, JetBlue, and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hunter AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Hunter AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hilton Head Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hilton Head Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
